New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 1 月 3 日星期三 04:07:48 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Northland Brynderwyns state highway closure will cost everyone, truck driver warns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ Denise PiperThe extra costs for taking the detour will have to be passed on, truck drivers say. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The closure of State Highway 1 at Brynderwyn Hills will cost about $200 each truck trip, logging truck driver Grant Caldwell says, with costs being passed on to consumers. Photo / Michael Cunningham

Wed, 03 Jan 2024 03:41:37 +0000 Emergency services responded to a serious crash on SH29 in the lower Kaimai Range on December 28.
